hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #11# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Wonderitem

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Deku Tree Compass#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Poacher's Saw# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Kokiri Sword#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #the Mirror Shield#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Kokiri Sword#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
